original: @#/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams
analyzed: kyi bdag po chen po khams

original: gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
analyzed: gsum dbang sdud dmar po

original: sgrub pa'i thabs/ tshhogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabasag gi sgrub thabs/
analyzed: sgrub ba tshhogs kyi bdag po dod ba dbang phyug gi sgrub thabasag gi sgrub

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ga na pa ti d+ha tu tri ka ra ta shi ku ru sa d+ha nam/
analyzed: gar skad ha ga na ba ti d+ha tu tri ka ra ta chi ku ru sa d+ha

original: bod skad du/_tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
analyzed: bod skad kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po

original: sgrub pa'i thabs/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/de nas lha chen
analyzed: sgrub ba rten dbang phyug la phyag tshhal nas lha chen

original: dbang phyug dpal/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po sgrub par bya/_/nags tshhal ri bo
analyzed: dbang phyug kyi bdag po sgrub ba tshhal ri bo

original: dmar po ru/_/nub ltas dben par man+dal ni/_/zla kham ra ga lta bu la/_/tshan
analyzed: dmar po ltas dben ba man+dal kham ra ga lta bu

original: dan gur gum dag gis byug_/me tog dmar po'i tshhom bu dgu'am lnga dgod/_/sku
analyzed: dan gur gum dag gis tog dmar po tshhom bu dgu lnga

original: dang bum pa legs par man+dal ste dgram/_/rnam lnga la sogs mchod pa ni/_/rig
analyzed: dang bum ba legs ba man+dal ste lnga la sogs mchod ba

original: pa 'dzin pas ci nus bsham/_/la du la phug gtor ma yang /_/me tog dmar
analyzed: ba dzin ba ci nus du la bugs thor ma yang tog dmar

original: pos brgyan pa dgod/_/pad+ma'i sdong po'i phreng ba dag_/legs par g.yas pas
analyzed: pos rgyan ba sdong po phreng ba ba g.yas ba

original: bzung la bzlas pa bya/_/de nas bdag nyid mgon po ni/_/'od dpag med
analyzed: bzung la bzlas ba nas bdag nyid mgon po dpog med

original: tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
analyzed: tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po sgrub ba thabs

original: pa'i khro bor rta mgrin du skyed/_/de'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/man+dal steng gi
analyzed: ba khro bor rta mgrin du thugs ka d zer steng gi

original: tshhom bu 'i steng gi sku las/_/lha chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/_/sku mdog dmar
analyzed: tshhom bu mang steng gi sku chen dod ba dbang phyug mdog dmar

original: po hri las skyed/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi bgrang phreng g.yas dang po dang /_/g.yon dang po
analyzed: po hri las gcig phyag bzhi bgrong phreng g.yas dang po dang dang po

original: la phug 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/la du'i phor pa g.yas logs su/_/phreng ba
analyzed: la bugs dzin ba phyag rgya dang du phor ba g.yas logs ba

original: 'dzin pa'i 'og tu bsam/_/dgra sta dmar po g.yon 'og ma yin par/_/glang
analyzed: dzin ba g tu sta dmar po g.yon g ma yin

original: chen gdong la ral pa can/_/mu tig la sogs brgyan gyis spras/_/sku smad ldang nag dbang sngon dar gyis blubs/_/do shal la sogs phreng bas mdzes/_/zla ba
analyzed: chen gdong la ral ba tig la sogs rgyan gyis smad ldang nag dbang sngon dar gyis shal la sogs phreng ba ba

original: pad dkar steng na ni/_/g.yas rkyang ba yi tshhul gyis ni/_/bum pa sngon po'i khri
analyzed: pad dkar steng na rkyang ba yi tshhul gyis ba sngon po khri

original: la bzhugs/_/'od zer dmar 'phros lcags kyu can/_/ye shes dgug sogs
analyzed: la zer dmar phro lcags kyu shes gugs sogs

original: cho ga ni/_/mkhas pas tshhul bzhin byas nas kyang /_/spro sdu man ngag can gyis
analyzed: cho ga ba tshhul bzhin byed nas kyang sdu man ngag can gyis

original: ni/_/sgrub bya gang 'dod yid la dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sgom/_/bzlas pas sku
analyzed: byed gang dod yid la dmigs ba ting dzin ba sku

original: gsung thugs rnams bskul/_/sku bskul ba'i snying po om trigah_na ba ta ye/_ma ha rak+sha
analyzed: gsung thugs rnams skul ba snying po om trigah_na ba ta ha rak+sha

original: sa ma 'bum phrag gcig ya hu~m dzahgsung bskul ba om ma ha pad+ma gahna pa ta ye bye swa ha/_thugs
analyzed: sa ma bum phrag gcig ya hu~m dzahgsung skul ba om ma ha pad+ma gahna ba ta ye bye swa

original: skul ba hri_tshi ta gu na sid d+hi ba ra ta ka swa ha/_nye ba'i snying pos gsum ka skul gsung om ma ha
analyzed: skul ba hri_tshi ta gu na sid d+hi ba ra ta ka swa ba snying pos gsum ka skul gsung om ma ha

original: rak+ta ga na pa ta ye/_a kan+ta ya dza hum bam hoh_swa d+ha ya 'bum phrag gcig swa ha/_zhes
analyzed: rak+ta ga na ba ta kan+ta ya dza hum bam hoh_swa d+ha ya bum phrag gcig swa

original: pa'i gsang sngags ma nor bzlas/_/thun 'tshhams gtor mas mchod par bya/_/
analyzed: ba gsang sngags ma nor tshhams thor mas mchod ba

original: stod pas dngos grub gsol ba gdab/_/dang po theg chen bsam pa las/_/cho
analyzed: stod ba dngos grub gsol ba po theg chen bsam ba

original: ga rdzogs nas dngos grub blang /_/rtags bzang mthong nas sbyin sreg ni/_/bla
analyzed: ga rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bzang mthong nas sbyin sreg

original: ma'i man ngag bzhin du bya/_/de las dngos grub du ma 'byung /_/'di la the tshhom
analyzed: ma man ngag bzhin du las dngos grub du ma byung la the tshhom

original: yod min te/_/nges pa nyid du 'grub par bshad/_/yang na tshhogs bdag chen
analyzed: yod min ba nyid du grub ba na tshhogs bdag chen

original: po de/_/gtshug lag khang chen nang du ni/_/'dod yon du mas bskor ba ni/_/
analyzed: po lag khang chen nang du yon du mas skor ba
